clues: This film was directed by a two-time Academy Award winner.
The narrative is told out of chronological order.
Stars include John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson.
Includes the iconic 'Royale with Cheese' scene.
funFact: The word 'fuck' is used 265 times in the film!

clues: Starred in both basketball and baseball.
Led a team to six NBA championships.
Known for his competitive mindset and 'flu game.'
Played for the Chicago Bulls and Washington Wizards.
funFact: He made more money from Nike than his entire NBA salary.
